channel.title: RscEasy Help
channel.description:
[b][/b] Hello .
I needed some help with a sever i am currently trying to set up .
If any could help me, i'd be very thankful
Anyways lets get to the point .....
When i try to run sever, there seems to be a problem
I know you go to compile sever and edited but i dont no what to change them too
If someone could give me the source ???
Looking forward to your post, Cya . ;D

item.title: RscEasy Help
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“EazY, post:3, topic:268956”][quote author=yong min link=topic=354870.msg2717867#msg2717867 date=1237755105]
Hm, it may be just me lacking in English, but I am not entirely understanding your post.

Your source is: EasyRSC.

If you’re having problems running the server, make sure your ant path is set correctly.
[/quote]

Oo lol, Ye i was wondering how do i set my Ant path . . =S[/quote]

  1. Make sure you have an ant folder in with your server folder.

  2. Right click on Run Server.bat and click edit.

  3. Make sure it says the following:

@echo off TITLE EasyRSC set PATH=%PATH%;ant\bin ant runserver exit

  1. If it doesn’t, edit it and click save.

If you need more help, don’t hesitate to ask.

Regards,

Yong-Min

Read full topic
